header.description: Language labels for the PxShopware extension in the FRONTEND

trans-unit.source:
You are using the trial version of this extension!

Please download our TYPO3-Connector plugin from shopware store and install it on your shopware system to get the full version and enable all features. To demonstrate the features of this extension we render one item (article, category) here.

If you have questions or would get more information about our products feel free to contact us or visit our website.
